title: Power Analysis: How Tadej Pogačar Crushed Records at Liège-Bastogne-Liège
content:
With 8.4 w/kg climbs and a 7.4 w/kg late in the race, Pogačar’s LBL numbers are straight up absurd.

Read the full article at Power Analysis: How Tadej Pogačar Crushed Records at Liège-Bastogne-Liège on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
